property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, discard a card from your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your spells may each cost 1 less to cast. They can't cost less than 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ At the start of your turn, if this creature is in your graveyard, you may destroy 2 of your creatures. If you do, put this creature from your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Search your deck. You may take a spell from your deck, show that spell to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your creatures that have power 6000 or more cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less. TWINPACT {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Put all your opponent's creatures that have power 4000 or less into its owner's mana zone.

property.name: Rules1
property.value: ■ Your creatures that have power 6000 or more cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.

property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Put all your opponent's creatures that have power 4000 or less into its owner's mana zone.
